name: Mystic Forest Entrance
description: A dimly lit path leading into an ancient forest. The air is thick with the scent of damp earth and old magic. You notice a sturdy, locked chest near the base of an ancient tree.

hiddenObjects.name: Rusty Key
hiddenObjects.description: An old, rusty key. Wonder what it opens?

hiddenObjects.name: Ancient Scroll
hiddenObjects.description: A tattered scroll with faded, unreadable writing.

hiddenObjects.name: Locked Chest
hiddenObjects.description: A sturdy chest, firmly locked. It looks like it needs a key.

interaction.successMessage: The Rusty Key fits the lock perfectly! The chest creaks open, revealing Gold Coins!

revealedItem.name: Gold Coins
revealedItem.description: A small pouch of glittering gold coins.

name: Abandoned Mine Shaft
description: The entrance to a dark and foreboding mine. A chilling draft emanates from within.

hiddenObjects.name: Glowing Gemstone
hiddenObjects.description: A rough gemstone that emits a faint, pulsating light.

name: Smuggler's Cove
description: A hidden cove, notorious for illicit trade and pirate dealings. The salty air is thick with secrets.

hiddenObjects.name: Treasure Map Fragment
hiddenObjects.description: A torn piece of parchment, showing a crude drawing of islands and an 'X' that marks the spot.
hiddenObjects.foundMessage: Ye found a piece of a Treasure Map!

hiddenObjects.name: Bottle of Grog
hiddenObjects.description: A dusty bottle filled with a potent, pirate brew. Smells like adventure (and bad decisions).
hiddenObjects.foundMessage: Ahoy! A Bottle of Grog to quench yer thirst!

name: Sunken Shipwreck
description: The ghostly remains of a pirate ship, resting silently on the seabed. Treasures and dangers may lurk within.

hiddenObjects.name: Sextant
hiddenObjects.description: A nautical instrument used for navigating by the stars. Essential for any seasoned pirate captain.
hiddenObjects.foundMessage: A trusty Sextant! Now ye can chart a course to riches!

hiddenObjects.name: Cache of Doubloons
hiddenObjects.description: A small, waterlogged chest spilling over with gold coins!
hiddenObjects.foundMessage: Shiver me timbers! Ye found a cache of 50 Gold Doubloons!

name: Pirate Outpost
description: A ramshackle outpost built on a remote island, flying the Jolly Roger high. A haven for scallywags.

hiddenObjects.name: Pirate Flag
hiddenObjects.description: A tattered black flag with a skull and crossbones. The infamous Jolly Roger.
hiddenObjects.foundMessage: The Jolly Roger! Fly it high and proud, pirate!

name: Port Royal Market
description: A bustling marketplace filled with merchants and goods from across the seas. You can almost smell the spices and hear the bartering.

tradableGoods.name: Bottle of Rum
tradableGoods.description: A hearty spirit, good for courage or celebration.

tradableGoods.name: Sextant
tradableGoods.description: A nautical instrument for navigation. Always in demand by captains.
